This is the telegram we sent to Bernie Buck to help him identify the packages
arriving in New York.
Mr* Bernard Buck
Station WNYC
25>00 Municipal Building
New York New York
KM
mm kbktthk
Additional information which may be helpfulo WNYC ordered 75,000 imprinted
folders and 20,000Tfolders + an Any blank folders in excess
of 20,000 should be returned to URBANA. None of the folders sent by DENVER-
CHICAGO TRUCKING are inprinted* Thank you again.
Lorraine Linden
Secretary to Mr. Miles
